title: Synthesis, characterization and application of steel waste-based iron oxide nanoparticles for removal of heavy metals from industrial wastewaters
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Tumutungire Mwebembezi, Joel Wakatuntu, Joseph Jjagwe, Christopher Kanyesigye, Robinah N. Kulabako, Peter Wilberforce Olupot
